Dashboard.subtitle: Your mental wellness journey continues here.

MoodTracker.title: How are you feeling today?
MoodTracker.description: Track your mood to understand your emotional patterns.

QuickActions.title: Quick Actions
QuickActions.mitraDescription: Talk about what's on your mind.

Chatbot.initialMessage: Hello! I'm your MannMitra assistant. How are you feeling today? You can talk to me about anything on your mind.
Chatbot.quickReplyTalk: I need to talk to someone.
Chatbot.disclaimer: This is an AI assistant. For emergencies, please use the Emergency Support button.

BookSession.title: Book a Confidential Session
BookSession.description: Schedule a private appointment with a campus counselor.
BookSession.cardDescription: Select a date and time that works for you. All sessions are confidential.
BookSession.incompleteSelectionDesc: Please select a date and a time slot to book your session.
BookSession.bookingConfirmedDesc: Your session is booked for {date} at {time}. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.

Community.title: Community Forum
Community.description: Share your thoughts and connect with peers. You are anonymous here.
Community.newPostDescription: Share what's on your mind. Your post is anonymous.
Community.newPostPlaceholder: What would you like to share?

Profile.title: Your Profile
Profile.description: Manage your account and personal information.
Profile.logOutDescription: Simulate logging out of the application.

Resources.title: Resource Library
Resources.description: Explore curated articles, videos, and audio guides for your mental well-being.
